title: HUIDI 98 cm (40 inch) HD Ready LED Smart TV  (HD42D1M18)

product_specification.In The Box:
1 LED TV
Table Stand
Remote
Manual And Screws
Warranty card and wall mount
Batteries cells included
product_specification.Covered in Warranty: Warranty of the Product is Limited to Manufacturing Defects Only
product_specification.Not Covered in Warranty: Warranty Does Not Cover Any External Accessories (Such as Battery, Cable, Carrying Bag), Damage Caused to the Product Due to Improper Installation by Customer, Normal Wear and Tear to Magnetic Heads, Audio, Video, Laser Pick-ups and TV Picture Tubes, Panel, Damages Caused to the Product by Accident, Lightening, Ingress of Water, Fire, Dropping or Excessive Shock, Any Damage Caused Due to Tampering of the Product by an Unauthorized Agent, Liability for Loss of Data, Recorded Images or Business Opportunity Loss.
product_specification.Installation & Demo Details: Please note that any unauthorized handling or self-installation of the product will lead to return & product warranty being void. Flipkart will facilitate Installation & Demo at a time of your convenience from a brand authorized service engineer. Flipkart will communicate the day and time slot of the scheduled Installation & Demo through an SMS. The Installation & First Demo service will be provided free of cost. The service engineer will install your new TV, either on a wall mount or on the table top. The wall mount is provided free of cost. The authorized service engineer will be providing a detailed demo that includes. a. Physical check of all ports, including power and USB ports. b. Checking also of accessories c. Understanding your new TV's features with a complete demonstration of features and settings d. Quick run-through on how to operate the TV e. Preventive maintenance action to be taken.

product_description.Get Set for Movie Marathons: With this TV, you can connect to your Netflix account and enjoy revolutionary movies and TV series in stunning HDR quality.
product_description.Prompt and Efficient: This TV features a quad-core CPU and dual-core GPU that's furnished with 1 GB of RAM and almost 8 GB of storage. Supported by these noteworthy specifications, this TV allows for effortless multitasking and smooth performance while maintaining a steady response rate.

Hey Guys! I bought 32 Inch Smart LED TV. Its an amazing TV with amazing picture quality & pocket friendly at the same time. If anyone will ask my choice to buy another LED TV so I happily say ’YES’ to HUIDI. They have amazing after sales service as well as helps us to request our installation & our any issue.

Cheers Huidi
